title: Episode 116: Flordelis
description:
A minister. A gospel singer. A member of parliament. This Brazilian political figure made a name for herself even before being elected. But some say that behind the scenes, her ministry was a means for profit and eventually murder. Was this politician a victim of her children’s actions or was she secretly the mastermind who plotted it all to take control?
